    T - type of options

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateSubCommand, PublishSubCommand

    abstract class CommonCreateAndPublishSubCommand<T extends CreateAndPublishOptions>
extends BaseSubCommand<T>
    Common functionality for CreateSubCommand and PublishSubCommand.

    Sven Strittmatter
